description.message: Follow updates of online manga readers. Beautify reading, with full chapters scans.

page_popup_title.description: Page title of popup page > Reading list

page_ie_title.description: Page title of import export page

page_options_title.description: Page title of import export page

options_on_websites.description: This is the header of the options page tab about reading mangas

options_general.description: This is the header of the options page tab general

options_supported.description: This is the header of the options page tab about supported websites

options_web_chapter_display_mode.description: This is the title of the options page section chapter display mode

options_web_chapter_display_chapter_desc.message: While reading a manga, display the whole chapter instead of the current page

options_web_chapter_display_mode_1.message: Scans are displayed on top of one another
options_web_chapter_display_mode_1.description: Option Chapter display mode 1 --> images are displayed on top of one another

options_web_chapter_display_mode_2.message: Scans are displayed two by two occidental reading mode
options_web_chapter_display_mode_2.description: Option Chapter display mode 2 --> images are displayed two by two occidental reading mode

options_web_chapter_display_mode_3.message: Scans are displayed two by two japanese reading mode
options_web_chapter_display_mode_3.description: Option Chapter display mode 3 --> images are displayed two by two japanese reading mode

options_web_resize_desc.message: Resize scans images to fit screen if they are too wide

options_web_loading.description: This is the title of the options page section loading

options_web_load_desc.message: See loading progression in the title bar

options_web_imgorder_desc.message: Load scans in the order of the chapter

options_web_imgorder_info.message: This option involve that the chapter's loading will be slower but guarantees that the first scan which will be loaded is the first of the chapter and so on...

options_web_prefetch_desc.message: Prefetch next chapter while reading manga.

options_web_prefetch_info.message: A progress bar indicating the prefetch level of the next chapter appears inside the "Next" button

options_web_markwhendownload_desc.message: Mark chapter as read when the full chapter has been downloaded
options_web_markwhendownload_desc.description: Option Update once fully loaded description

options_web_facilities.description: This is the title of the options page section facilities

options_web_addauto_opt.message: Automatically add read manga to reading list
options_web_addauto_opt.description: Option automatically add read manga to reading list

options_web_addauto_desc.message: Automatically add manga in my reading list when I read it.
options_web_addauto_desc.description: Option automatically add manga to list description

options_web_addauto_info.message: If you uncheck this option, you will have a '+' button in the navigation bar to add the current manga in the list.
options_web_addauto_info.description: Option automatically add manga to list description

options_web_lrkeys_opt.description: Option Use keys to read manga

options_web_lrkeys_desc.message: Use left /right keys while reading to go previous / next scan.
options_web_lrkeys_desc.description: Option Use keys to read manga description

options_web_autobm_desc.message: Automatically Bookmark scans when double click on it.

options_web_rightnext_opt.message: Next chapter when read ended (right key)
options_web_rightnext_opt.description: Option next chapter on right key

options_web_rightnext_desc.message: Right key goes to next chapter when at bottom of the page.
options_web_rightnext_desc.description: Option next chapter on right key description

options_gen_aspect.description: This is the title of the options page section customization

options_gen_newTab_opt.description: Option Open popup in new tab

options_gen_newTab_desc.message: Open my manga reading list in a new tab when i click on the All Mangas Reader's icon
options_gen_newTab_desc.description: Option Open popup in new tab description

options_gen_groupmgs_desc.message: Group mangas which have the same name on one line. When mangas are grouped, you can see all occurrences of the manga by clicking on the + icon next to the manga's name.
options_gen_groupmgs_desc.description: Option Group mangas by name description

options_gen_displastup_opt.message: Badge with last time manga had new chapter
options_gen_displastup_opt.description: Option Badge with last time updated

options_gen_displastup_desc.message: Display a badge with a calendar icon and the last time in days a new chapter has been published (badge will be removed if last chapter is more than 50 days old)
options_gen_displastup_desc.description: Option Badge with last time updated description

options_gen_dark_desc.message: Display a dark background in All Mangas Reader pages

options_gen_colors_new.message: Color of mangas with unread chapters

options_gen_colors_read.message: Color of mangas with all chapters read

options_gen_colors_notfollow.message: Color of mangas which you choose to stop following
options_gen_colors_notfollow.description: Option color of mangas not followed

options_gen_updates.description: This is the title of the options page section updates

options_gen_stopupdateforaweek_opt.message: Pause updates for a week after new chapter
options_gen_stopupdateforaweek_opt.description: Option to pause updates for a week after new chapter

options_gen_stopupdateforaweek_desc.message: Pause updates for one week after a new chapter has been found for a manga .
options_gen_stopupdateforaweek_desc.description: Description of the functionning of the pause updates for a week after new chapter option

options_gen_stopupdateforaweek_info.message: When a new chapter is found, the next one will be published at least one week later. Check the box below to have updates resume for two days (one before and one after) the following week. If no chapters are found during this period, updates are paused for another week and so on.
options_gen_stopupdateforaweek_info.description: Description of the functionning of the pause updates for a week after new chapter option

options_gen_checkmgstart_desc.message: Update chapters list on browser startup

options_gen_refreshspin_desc.message: Spin the sharingan icon when All Mangas Reader is updating chapters list.

options_gen_savebandwidth_desc.message: Save bandwidth while loading chapter list

options_gen_savebandwidth_info.message: This options waits for one manga to be updated before updating the next one, update is slower.

options_gen_displayzero_desc.message: Display a grey "0" on AMR's icon when there is no new manga.

options_gen_nocount_desc.message: Do not display a badge with the number of unread manga but display AMR's icon in color if there are new mangas and in grey if not.
options_gen_nocount_desc.description: Option grey sharingan as icon description

options_gen_notifs.description: This is the title of the options page section notifications

options_gen_shownotifications_desc.message: Show browser notification when new chapters are found.
options_gen_shownotifications_desc.description: Option Notify on new chapter description

options_gen_notificationtimer_label.message: Time before the notification close itself:
options_gen_notificationtimer_label.description: Option select time before notif closes

options_gen_notificationtimer_def.description: Option closed by user action for option select time before notif closes

options_sup_desc.message: AMR provides many supported Web Sites. You can deactivate web sites you don't use. Only web sites for which you don't have mangas in your reading list can be deactivated. You can filter the websites supporting specific language to help you. Clicking a checkbox in the table below deactivate the corresponding website.
options_sup_desc.description: Description of the supported websites tab

options_sup_repos_desc.message: To test how All Mangas Reader works with all supported website, you can use our lab !

options_gen_mirrors_header_act.description: Label of the mirrors table header containing activation checkbox

options_gen_mirrors_filter_all.description: Label of the option in filter languages list for no filter (display all languages)

notif_message.message: ... has new chapter(s) on $1! Click anywhere to open the next unread chapter.

refresh_lists_desc.message: Delete lists of manga stored in local database. These lists are retrieved from websites on which we can get the whole manga list that can be read on the website. Deleting it does not affect your current reading list, these lists will be reloaded on next search for the enabled websites which support this functionality
refresh_lists_desc.description: Tooltip of the reset stored manga lists button in right panel

refresh_lists_nb.description: Label to tell the number of stored lists. $1 is the number of lists and $2 the number of manga names and urls stored

ie_export_mangas_viewable_desc.message: Export only mangas currently viewable in your list, if this option is unchecked, all mangas from your list will be exported. To select only some mangas to export, you can order them using categories and view only the category you want to export.

ie_export_mangas_viewable.message: Export only mangas currently viewable in your list
ie_export_mangas_viewable.description: Export only mangas currently viewable in your list option

ie_export_content.message: Choose if export must contain your personal reading state. If you want the export to be used as a backup of your reading, include manga reading state. If you want to share it with people, choose export to share (your personal reading state and options for these mangas will not be exported)

reader_thinscan_title.description: Title of the popup displayed if thin scans detected (height >= 3 * width)

reader_thinscan_description.message:
This chapter contains thin long scans (their height exceeds three times their width).
 Current layout options won't offer you the best possible reading. We can automatically adjust the way this manga is displayed (prefer not reading it with side by side scans and avoid scaling scans in height). 
Do you want to adjust these parameters ? 
Note: Default behaviour can be adjusted in settings
reader_thinscan_description.description: Description of the popup displayed if thin scans detected (height >= 3 * width)

reader_alert_lastscan.message: This is the latest scan of the chapter. Double tap right key to read next chapter !
reader_alert_lastscan.description: Alert displayed if trying to go to next scan and last scan

reader_alert_lastscan_clicked.message: This is the latest scan of the chapter. Double click on the right part of the screen to read next chapter !
reader_alert_lastscan_clicked.description: Alert displayed if trying to go to next scan and last scan while clicking

reader_alert_firstscan.message: This is the first scan of the chapter. Double tap left key to read previous chapter !
reader_alert_firstscan.description: Alert displayed if trying to go to previous scan and first scan

reader_alert_firstscan_clicked.message: This is the first scan of the chapter. Double click on the left part of the screen to read previous chapter !
reader_alert_firstscan_clicked.description: Alert displayed if trying to go to previous scan and first scan while clicking

reader_alert_firstchapter.message: This is the first published chapter.
reader_alert_firstchapter.description: Alert displayed if trying to go to previous chapter and first chapter

reader_firsttime_title.description: Title of the popup displayed first time reader is shown

reader_firsttime_description.message:
All Mangas Reader's reader has many features to offer you the best possible reading experience. Before we let you read your manga and discover all these features, please choose between these two options (you can change it when you want) : 
* do you want the **whole chapter to be displayed as a long strip**
* or just **one page at a time** (could be one page with two scans on it) ?
In both cases, the whole chapter is loaded in the background and you can navigate smoothly between pages with your keyboard
reader_firsttime_description.description: Description of the popup displayed first time reader is shown

reader_firsttime_but_longstrip.description: First time, a popup is shown with two choices, button to choose a long strip

reader_firsttime_but_single.description: First time, a popup is shown with two choices, button to choose a one page

reader_tips_1.message:
To navigate easily through chapter's pages, put your mouse at the bottom of the screen, **thumbnails of the whole chapters appear !**
 Click on the page you want to see or use the page navigator to view previous / next pages and enjoy !

reader_tips_2.message:
Use your keyboard to read smoothly : 
* Right / left arrows shows you next / previous scan
* Double tap at the end / start of a chapter goes to next / previous chapter 
 You can find all key shortcuts with the _F1_ key

reader_tips_3.message:
You loved this chapter and want a way to **find it back later** ?
 Click on the star in the side menu and then on the _Bookmark chapter_ button. You can even add a note to find it easily. 
To consult all your bookmarks, go to All Mangas Reader's bookmarks page (from the popup click on vertical dots and then click on the star)

reader_tips_4.message:
The **next chapter is loading while you are reading** the current one so you don't have to wait to read what you are passionate about.
 If you don't want to preload next chapter, go check the options.
 You can see a progression bar indicating how much of the next chapter is loaded below the chapters list in the side bar or around the next button when the side bar is closed and you hover the menu button.

reader_tips_5.message:
All the mangas you read are **added to your reading list automatically**. If you don't want to add them automatically, go to the options page and uncheck the _Automatically add manga to my reading list_ option.
 Then, a green plus will appear in the side menu to let you add a manga to your reading list. This button is even quickly available directly below the menu button if the side bar is closed !

reader_tips_6.message:
This scan is so cool that you want a way to find it back quickly ? Click on the pale yellow banner in the top right hand corner and save, it will be **added to your bookmarks !**
 A bookmarked scan has a yellow banner in the top right hand corner. Click on it to add / edit a note linked to the scan. 
 You can view all the bookmarked scans in a chapter by clicking on the star in the side menu. Click on a scan and access it directly in the chapter !
To consult all your bookmarks, go to All Mangas Reader's bookmarks page (from the popup click on vertical dots and then click on the star)

reader_tips_7.message:
You can **change the scale of your scans** from the side menu ! Choose between : 
* Width : your scans fit in width in the screen (a vertical scrollbar can appear)
* Height : your scans fit in height in the screen (an horizontal scrollbar can appear). This option is only available if full chapter is disabled
* Container : **your whole scans fit in the screen** (no scrollbars). This option is only available if full chapter is disabled
* None : no resize (both scrollbars can appear)
Use your keyboard to swith modes : _Ctrl + w_ for width, _Ctrl + h_ for height and _Ctrl + e_ for container. Use _+ and - keys_ to resize your scans if none is selected.

reader_tips_8.message:
You are reading a manga with many chapters and you **don't want notifications** to annoy you. 
 Click on the _pause_ button in the side menu. Click on the _play_ buttton to have your notifications back.

reader_tips_9.message:
You want to **view two pages of your chapter at the same time** ?
 Click on the _Display as a book_ option. You can then choose to read your manga from left to right or from right to left.

reader_tips_10.message:
Want to access the **home page of the online reader** which is hosting this manga ? 
Click on the website's icon next to the manga title in the side menu.
Click on the manga title to view the page detailing this manga on the website.

reader_tips_11.message:
Want to know **where you are in the chapter** ?
Press _Alt + s_ to view the current page number and your current progression !
 Want to know the chapter name and don't want to grab your mouse to open the side menu ?
 Press _Alt + c_ and it will be right under your nose !

reader_tips_12.message:
Want to **jump to last scan quickly ?** ?
Press _Alt + d_ or _Alt + _ to jump to the last scan !
 Want to jump to the first one ? Use _Alt + a_ or _Alt + _.
Want to try a random scan ? Use _Alt + r_ !

reader_social_all.message: All Mangas Reader on social networks

reader_social_patreon.message: Help us maintain All Mangas Reader ! Become our patron

reader_social_discord.message: Join our community on Discord ! It's the right place for any question about AMR.

reader_help_rate_title.description: Title of the rate us dialog, appear once in a while, can stop receiving this dialog

reader_help_rate_message.message:
You seem to **enjoy reading using All Mangas Reader** ! 
 Maintaining and improving your All Mangas Reader experience takes us a lot of time and efforts. That would be nice if you could take a few seconds to give us feedback on **Firefox Addons**. Rate us and leave us a message, that will be really appreciated !
 Click on the _I give feedback now !_ button to go to Firefox Addons ! _(in another tab, we won't spoil your reading, don't worry :))_
 Remember that if you need help or if want to help, you can always join our community on [Discord](https://discord.gg/bdzk9hR) or [help us on Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/allmangasreader) !
reader_help_rate_message.description: Message of the rate us dialog, appear once in a while, can stop receiving this dialog

reader_help_rate_action.description: Action button label to go rate us on Firefox addons in the rate us dialog, appear once in a while, can stop receiving this dialog

reader_help_patreon_title.message: Help us building All Mangas Reader
reader_help_patreon_title.description: Title of the help us dialog, appear once in a while, can stop receiving this dialog

reader_help_patreon_message.message:
You really seem to **enjoy reading using All Mangas Reader** ! 
 Maintaining and developing new features to your favorite reader takes a considerable amount of time, and even if the project is open sourced, it is supported by mainly one contributor. We don't need a full time developer on that project but a week per month is a minimum to fix things and create awesome features.
 Click on the _Become a patron_ button to go to our Patreon, giving even little will be greatly appreciated, this helps us a lot ! _(we will open it in another tab, we won't spoil your reading, don't worry :))_
 Remember that if you need help or if want to help, you can always join us on [Discord](https://discord.gg/bdzk9hR) !
reader_help_patreon_message.description: Message of the help us dialog, appear once in a while, can stop receiving this dialog

reader_help_patreon_action.description: Action button label to go patreon in the help us dialog, appear once in a while, can stop receiving this dialog

reader_help_1000_title.description: Title of the help us dialog, appear once in a while, can stop receiving this dialog

reader_help_1000_message.message:
Wow ! You really **read a lot using All Mangas Reader** ! Already **$1 chapters !** 
 We hope that you enjoy this extension, if you do, you can help us by [rating us on Firefox](https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/all-mangas-reader/) or by [giving us on Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/allmangasreader), every little contributions is really appreciated !
 Remember that if you need help or if want to help, you can always join us on [Discord](https://discord.gg/bdzk9hR) !
reader_help_1000_message.description: Message of the help us dialog, appear once in a while, can stop receiving this dialog

reader_help_stop.description: Action button label to stop showing help messages

options_gen_waitbetweenupdates_desc.message: By default, AMR launches all manga chapters update requests at the same time, to avoid being banned from some websites are just for bandwidth convenience, you can set a number a seconds to wait between two requests

options_gen_allowtracking_desc.message: Allow All MAngas Reader to collect reading data for statistics purpose. Your privacy is respected, every piece of data is collected anonymously.

amr_newversion.message: A new version of AMR is available
amr_newversion.description: Notification when a new version is available

amr_newversion_long.message: Normally, AMR will auto update. However, if you installed it manually (in chrome for example), you will have to download the latest version and install it manually. You can find instructions on AMR main website.
amr_newversion_long.description: Notification when a new version is available (tooltip text)

importmangas_message.message: These mangas are actually being imported in background. If the list to import is extensive, it can take a few minutes, especially if you set options to save bandwidth or to delay requests when updating chapters. As long as your browser is opened, your mangas will be imported.
